title: The Pacific century
creator_credit: PBI Productions, Jigsaw Productions, Nihon Hoso Kyokai, KCTS (Television station : Seattle, Wash.), Teleac Holland and Alex Gibney
brief_description: A series which describes and explains the emergence, from the nineteenth century onward, of modern nations from the rich and varied cultures and societies of Pacific Asia. A Study Guide and Faculty Manual are also available to accompany this telecourse.
creator_credit_for_label: PBI Productions, Jigsaw Productions, Nihon Hoso Kyokai, KCTS (Television station : Seattle, Wash.), Teleac Holland and Alex Gibney
